title: Interpretation of a dream about lead by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bullets: It has many connotations and meanings for individuals and makes them eager to know more about it, and the following article will provide many explanations on this topic. Let us read the following. Interpretation of a dream about bullets: The dreamer’s dream of bullets and hearing their loud sound indicates that he is surrounded by many people who do not like goodness at all. They wish him evil evil. If one sees bullets in his dream, this is a sign of the seriously disturbed psychological state that he is suffering from at that time due to his inability to achieve his goals. If the dreamer sees bullets during his sleep, this indicates that there are many people who They try to distort his image among people by spreading false gossip about him. The dreamer seeing bullets in his dream symbolizes his suffering in that period from many problems and difficulties that he cannot overcome. Interpretation of a dream about bullets by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees bullets in a dream as A sign that there are those who want to cause him serious harm, and he must beware of their evil. If one sees bullets in his dream, this indicates that there is someone near him who wishes him great harm. In the event that the dreamer sees celestial bodies in his sleep during his sleep, this expresses About the presence of many crises that he was suffering from at that time, which made him feel very distressed. The dreamer who sees bullets in a dream symbolizes that he will fall into a big problem that he will not be able to get rid of easily. Interpretation of a single women’s dream of bulletsIf an unmarried woman sees bullets in her dream , this means that she is living in a state of extreme turmoil at that time as a result of many crises. If the dreamer sees gunshots in her dream, this means that she is surrounded by friends who do not deserve her who urge her to commit many obscene and shameful things and she must stay away from them immediately before they kill her. The dreamer sees In her sleep, there are many spheres around her, and this indicates that she is wasting her money on many unnecessary things and will soon suffer a financial crisis if she does not control her actions a little. For a girl to see in her dream shooting bullets symbolizes the presence of those who seek to force her into a very malicious conspiracy. To harm her and she must be very careful of her next movements. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of bullets: Seeing a married woman in a dream with bullets indicates bad events that will happen in her life and make her very miserable. If the dreamer sees bullets in her dream during her sleep, this is a sign that she is suffering from many disturbances in her relationship with her husband. At that time, this makes the situation between them very bad. If the dreamer sees bullets in his dream, this means that she will face a lot of problems because she is not behaving well. A woman’s dream of shooting bullets and running away from them symbolizes that she will get a lot of money that will help her improve Her living situation and avoiding the financial problems she may face. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of bullets: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with bullets without feeling fear symbolizes a

title: Interpretation of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: In interpreting the vision of pigeons in a dream, there are many important signs that must be recognized so that the Muslim knows all the signs behind this vision, which he must have comprehensive knowledge of. This is especially because pigeons are birds that many of us know and work in a different system and way. Unlike other birds, this pigeon is considered one of the most important, beautiful, and best birds ever. Therefore, many Muslims are interested in trying to interpret a dream about a dove, and they try to interpret seeing it in a dream, so that they know the most important signs and things that will appear in their lives after this vision. The interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream by Ibn Sirin, through the site, is different, and we will see the opinion of Ibn Sirin, the great scholar, in interpreting visions in the explanation Seeing a dove in a dream, as the meaning was mentioned in the following topics: Ibn Sirin says that when a person sees a dove in his dream, especially if it is white, this indicates the good news that he will receive soon, but when he sees a black dove at his feet, some problems and difficulties in life appear. If the dreamer sees a black dove in a dream entering the house, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to some sorrows, problems and difficulties that he may face in his life and he must beware of them. However, if he is seen chasing colored pigeons, this is evidence that this fortuneteller will fulfill his desires and dreams and that he will achieve his goals. And his ambitions soon. But if the fortuneteller sees pigeons eating his eggs, this indicates the success of that fortuneteller in a large trade and that he will achieve through this trade a lot of endless money. Interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a white dove in a dream, this means That she will receive good news and that the date of her marriage will approach. But if she sees a pigeon’s nest, this indicates that she will marry a man who loves her and loves her as well, and she will live with him, God willing, a very happy life. As for the girl who sees black pigeons in a dream, this is a sign of some problems and difficulties that may This girl faces in her private life and she must deal with annoying matters in a calmer way than she accepts. Interpretation of a dream about a shower for a married woman: When a married woman sees a bathroom in a dream, this indicates good news that she will become pregnant in the very near future, and this is the interpretation of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a married woman. In general, if a married woman sees a slaughtered white dove, this may indicate that there are some problems that the woman may face with her husband and her husband’s family, and that there will be many disagreements between them and these problems need to be resolved as quickly as possible. But if he sees a black dove in The dream indicates that there are problems and disagreements with her husband and his family, and if these problems are not resolved, this may lead to divorce. However, if she sees a black dove locked in a cage, this means that she has left the place where the wife resides and will move to another place far from the place where she resides. Currently, if a married woman sees black pigeon feathers, this may indicate betrayal by her husband

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a ball in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Ball is considered one of the most popular games that adults prefer over children. It is one of the sports that witnesses a lot of competition between many teams, and it can be a reflection of a person’s journey to a place and in some visions he will be there. They are problems and concerns according to the state of insight, and football is a sport that has a large audience unlike other sports, and it is the only source of happiness for many people, especially in our time. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the ball yourself: Playing with the ball can indicate an emotional relationship that leads to the failure of the engagement or its cancellation. It may indicate disagreements with friends or family problems, and she may face difficulties in her field of study. Pushing kicks in a dream means fighting falsehood and committing many sins and mistakes. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ball for a married woman: A ball in a married woman’s dream may indicate marital problems and disagreements, or that The vision is a warning of disagreements and family quarrels. Achieving goals may indicate a sin committed by him and he must repent quickly. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ball for a divorced woman. Playing with a ball indicates problems, fears and sorrows. The ball may indicate the continuation of disputes with her ex-husband and his failure to return to her and return to her. It can Scoring goals indicates sins and bad talk, such as backbiting and gossiping. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a ball in a dream. A pregnant woman who sees a ball in a dream is a sign of childbirth. Anyone who plays ball happily is a sign of an easy birth, but if he is sad, this indicates a difficult birth. As for the one who sees himself playing ball and scoring goals, this is an indication that the male child will have a lot in the future. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ball for a man: A ball in a dream indicates travel, traveling, and moving from one city to another or a new place of residence. It can indicate rivalries and enmities. Playing with a ball indicates failure in romantic relationships. A personal vision of a famous football player expresses insightful success and difficult stages in his life. Kicking and scoring can indicate indecency or many sins. To see a red ball in a man’s dream shows that a man is pursuing a woman in different ways while He originally loved and adored her, the white ball shows the purity of the heart and the black ball shows the deceit and deceit of some friends. The ball may indicate a large amount of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a famous football player: Seeing a famous football player in a girl’s dream means success in her life. Seeing a married woman indicates a wonderful relationship in the near future. If a divorced woman finds out that she has married a famous football player, then this A sign that she has gone through difficult stages in her life and the beginning of a new, beautiful and happy life. The color of the ball in a dream. Seeing a red ball is a symbol for a woman in the life of a fortuneteller. A black ball is considered a sign of deception, cunning, and exposure to conspiracies and injustice. A white ball is a sign of good faith, peace and purity. The ball Yellow is a lot of money. A gray ball is a sign of religion. Score a goal in a dream. Seeing yourself kicking a ball and scoring a goal in a dream means...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a child in a dream from Ibn Sirin, the child crying in a dream, and the child being transported in a dream

preview.html: A little girl in a dream, interpreters say that the dream carries many interpretations that vary according to the details of the dream and the emotion of the viewer, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a child for unmarried people, married people, pregnant women, and humans. By Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. The little girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The little girl in a dream. Seeing the little girl in a dream foretells the unmarried dreamer that his marriage is approaching, and if the dreamer sees an ugly child in his dream wearing dirty clothes, the dream means that he will face a big problem in the coming days, so He must be careful, and if the dreamer sees the beautiful child in a dream, this indicates many positive changes in his life in the coming period. Dreaming of a child wearing torn clothes indicates the deterioration of the dreamer’s psychological state and his feeling of weakness and despair, and perhaps the vision is a warning to abandon these feelings And think positively so that he can succeed and move forward. The fetus is a male, and God knows best. The little girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a child is a good omen for the abundant goodness that awaits the dreamer in his coming days and indicates the abundance of his livelihood and that he will soon obtain a lot of money in a way he does not expect. Possibilities and experiences in the near future. If the dreamer is married and has not had children before, and sees an unknown little girl in his dream, this may symbolize the approaching pregnancy of his wife, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing, but seeing the ugly little girl. It indicates that the dreamer will face some problems in the coming period, so he must be strong and patient so that he can overcome any obstacle that stands in his way and prevents him from reaching his dreams. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes Thousands of interpretations from leading interpreters. The little girl in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a little girl for an unmarried woman shows that she is bearing a lot of responsibilities at the present time and is trying to do many tasks at the same time, which causes her psychological pressure and makes her need to relax. She is playing with a young girl, and this may symbolize her longing for childhood and her feelings. It is said that a dream about a girl indicates that the dreamer’s marriage to a good and handsome man is approaching, who will give her happy days and meet all her demands. A specific situation that she is currently living in. If an unmarried woman sees a beautiful child in her dream, which indicates that she felt stable and psychologically calm after a long period of stress and anxiety. A child in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a child for a married woman portends pleasant surprises that will soon knock on her door, and in the event that the dreamer is newly married And he saw a baby in his dream, it means that her pregnancy is approaching and that there will be positive changes in her life and God is Most High and All-Knowing and she will soon hear good news about one of her family members. A beautiful baby in a married woman’s dream foretells that she will soon receive a promotion at work, her financial situation will improve and she will earn a lot of money. Money, too

title: What is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing cats in a dream Cats are those angelic creatures that many love and are interested in owning and raising because of their great impact in improving the psychological state and creating an atmosphere of fun and joy. Seeing cats in a dream is a praiseworthy vision and is often taken as good news, but sometimes it is a dangerous warning. , especially if they are black or frightening in appearance. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about cats, and most importantly of all, it is evidence of the presence of many people in the life of the dreamer, some of whom carry in their hearts sincere intentions and love, and some of whom carry evil and evil. Also, Their presence somewhere expresses the existence of good relations between the people of this house in which harmony and friendliness prevail. Kittens in a dream indicate a house full of goodness, full of generosity and honesty, characterized by a lot of kindness and spending friendships on the needy and the poor. The interpretation of cats in a dream also varies according to their color and shape. And their nature in the dream, and sometimes according to how they are seen by humans. It has been said that small, dark-colored cats are evidence of the presence of evil people in the dreamer’s life who try to harm him whenever they have the opportunity. As for gray cats, they indicate the presence of a person who shows the opposite of what he hides, who is deceitful and malicious. , and tries to get close to the fortuneteller for vulgar personal purposes, and is often his family. But those with light colors express the pleasant events that will happen to him in the coming period and other things that he would like to happen and obtain. Happy colored cats also indicate that there will be loyal and sincere people in his life, with whom he will enjoy a beautiful and happy life and enter into many... Changes in his life. Cats are famous for their eyes, so the interpretation of the vision also depends on their appearance in the dream. If they appear angry, this indicates the presence of a disreputable woman in the dreamer’s life, trying to insult him and undermine his reputation among people. But if her sight is sad, this indicates The viewer was betrayed and humiliated by someone close to him. Kittens in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It is possible that this vision often indicates the presence of a source nearby that causes many problems and crises to the dreamer, but it is a cunning person who recites it so as not to reveal his treacherous truth. Sometimes it can It indicates many obstacles in the dreamer’s path, which prevent him from reaching his goal and achieving his hopes in life. But if he looks with anxiety and anticipation, this indicates that there is a character waiting for the appropriate moment to take revenge on him and take all his possessions from him in a moment of weakness, and it must be Very careful in the coming period. In rare cases, these cats are a sign of a hidden evil force that causes a lot of harm to the dreamer, such as less work or a genie chasing him - God forbid - and this is clear from her eyes and seeing them in one dream. What is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a single woman? Seeing cats in a dream for a single woman: This vision is usually interpreted as meaning that she will be able to prove her superior ability to achieve success

title: Interpretation of semen in a dream and the emission of semen from the penis in a dream

preview.html: Seeing sperm indicates diet, money, and other interpretations that we will explain to single girls, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men, such as masturbation, ejaculation during masturbation, the appearance of sperm or a man’s semen in one form or another, drinking semen, or wiping and washing the body of semen. I dreamed that Semen descends on the body by Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq bin Sirin and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic. Interpretation of sperm in a dream. Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, narrated that seeing a man’s sperm or sperm in a dream is an indication of the remaining money that increases with the passage of days, whether The fortuneteller was male or female. The amount of money received in reality is often related to the amount of sperm that appears in the dream, so the higher the number of sperm, the more money the dreamer will receive and achieve profits and growth faster.For whoever sees in his dream that semen is coming out of If he sees that semen is coming out of him to pollute his bed, then his vision indicates the approach of his marriage, especially if this dreamer is single, so he will find happiness and pleasure in his life. For a man who sees in his dream that he is doing sperm research for his wife, seeing him shows the amount of love and affection he has for her in his heart and that he brings her jewelry and beautiful clothes while he is awake. But if one sees that he is taking another person’s semen or that he has sperm coming out of someone in In a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain sums of money from this person in real life through legal methods that are free of suspicion or prohibition. And if he sees that he finds a pot or vessel full of semen, then he will find a treasure that will enrich him while he is awake. As for Whoever sees in his dream that he is masturbating and masturbating to ejaculate, then his vision shows that he will obtain suspicious and forbidden money if he ejaculates from this fluid by following some forbidden methods in reality to obtain money. title: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person giving birth to a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving birth to a child in a dream or dreams, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing a dead person giving birth to a child means goodness, justice, and a lot of sustenance if the newborn is a girl, and seeing a dead person giving birth to a new child means distress, anxiety, and hearing bad news, and we will explain that. This is in this article and the unmarried woman, as well as the married, pregnant and divorced woman of some imams such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other translators in the modern era, so follow us on the site. Vision. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving birth to a child according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Whoever sees a dead person giving birth to a boy indicates the emergence of problems in his life and hearing sad news. Seeing a dead person carrying a baby girl indicates alleviation of worries, spending debts, and a good situation. If someone sees that a dead person came and took A child, indicates the occurrence of a disaster or hearing bad news. Seeing a dead mother giving birth to a girl in a dream indicates the release of worries and anxiety. See also: Interpretation of seeing the dead kissing the living in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead giving birth to a child in an unmarried woman’s dream? A vision of a dead man giving birth to a child. In a dream for an unmarried woman, it indicates the problems that the girl is exposed to and the pain that she faces. If an unmarried girl sees that her deceased grandmother gave birth to a girl, it indicates the loss of neglect and success after failure. If a girl sees a dead person kissing a child, this means that you hear good news and we wish you success. See Also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person covered in a dream. What is the interpretation of dreams for a dead man giving birth to a child in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a dead mother giving birth to a girl in a dream for a married woman indicates the collapse of worry, the elimination of marital problems and disputes, and the improvement of life. If a married woman sees that the dead woman gives birth to a boy, A child, this indicates problems, fears, and hearing bad news. If a married woman sees a dead person kissing the hand of a small child, this indicates good relationships, family ties, and good morals for women. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person urinating in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving birth to a child in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees that A dead woman gives birth to a girl in a dream. This indicates the approaching date of childbirth and an easy and natural birth, and he will be happy with the child. Seeing a dead grandmother giving birth to a child in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates a problem that the pregnant woman will face during childbirth and problems. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead woman giving birth to a child in a dream for a divorced woman? If A divorced woman saw her mother dead or her grandmother giving birth to a girl in a dream. It indicates the end of worry and worry, an improvement in her life, and hearing good news. Seeing a grandmother giving birth to a boy in a divorced woman’s dream indicates problems, fears, and many problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person’s funeral in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream in which she gave birth? My dead grandmother? Seeing a dead grandmother giving birth to a boy indicates many problems and troubles for the pioneer and faltering life. If the fortuneteller sees that the grandmother is giving birth to the child, he takes him and walks. It indicates the loss of something for the pioneer and material losses. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about my husband’s torn shirt in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. The reality of the dream and its good interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Seeing the husband’s shirt torn in a dream may indicate that he is afflicted with witchcraft or the evil eye of that period and he must seek help from God. It is possible that seeing the husband’s shirt torn in the The dream indicates good events that may occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a torn shirt in a dream may indicate good changes that may occur in his life during this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a turtle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a turtle in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. The interpretation of seeing turtles in a dream varies, depending on the situation in which the dreamer sees it, like any other dream. The dream requires that the turtle search for an interpretation because it is a matter that can occupy the mind of the possessor of knowledge to learn its meaning. In the dream something appears. Today we share with you some interpretations that appeared in the dream for both men and women. Interpretation of seeing a turtle by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a turtle in a dream means that this person is ascetic in life and wants to get closer to God. And if you see a turtle entering your house, it means that you will be an important man or marry into a religious house. Ibn Sirin also explained that eating turtle meat indicates memorizing the Qur’an and that it is considered a good vision, and this also means that the dreamer is a person who has scientific advantages for people, and people benefit from him. Knowledge. Seeing sea turtles in a dream indicates the possibility of travel for the dreamer and it will be a fruitful trip with many good things. But if the turtle stands on the shore, it means that it will bring him money, goodness and many days. A married woman sees a turtle in a dream: If a married woman sees a turtle in her bed in her dream, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. But if she sees a large turtle inside the house, this means that her husband loves her and fears God in her. Pregnant woman and the interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream: Seeing a pregnant turtle in a dream means that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. If she sees a colored turtle in her dream, it means that she will give birth to a girl. If she sees that she has been bitten by a turtle, this indicates that her birth will be facilitated and the blessings of the new baby will increase, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees a turtle in bed, this means that she is approaching her due date and will receive many good things after giving birth. Seeing a turtle in one dream: Seeing turtles in a girl’s dream is evidence of her marriage to an important world with whom she will be happy. If she sees a turtle in a dream standing on her hands, this means marrying a respectable man who spends generously and generously. If a girl notices that she is kissing a turtle, this means success in life and getting rid of problems. Seeing a turtle in a man’s dream: If one sees that a turtle has bitten him, this means that he is a man of knowledge, and if he is painful, it means that he is benefiting from his knowledge. If he sees a turtle standing on the beach, it means that he will travel to gain knowledge. If he sees a sea turtle, it means that he will travel for money, and he will earn a lot from this trip. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream: If one sees a green turtle in his house, this means that he will be a wonderful human being. Also, seeing turtles running around the house means that they will become rich. If one sees that he is eating a turtle, it means that this person will memorize the Holy Qur’an and teach it to others. If he sees a turtle on the road, this is evidence that he does not give his house or his money as charity.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black dog for a married woman

preview.html: It can indicate a malicious person or a bad person, and through our translator, we deal with all interpretations of seeing a black dog through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a black dog in a dream for a single girlSeeing a black dog in a dream for a single girl shows several interpretations that depend on the situation in which the vision falls If an unmarried girl sees that she sees a black dog chasing her in a dream, the vision may indicate that there is a bad person in her life and she must avoid him. Or if an unmarried girl sees that a black dog is biting her in a dream, the vision indicates that she was harmed by a close person in The life of the person who had the vision. What if an unmarried girl saw that a black dog killed her in a dream. This vision shows a malicious person in her life, and God is Most High. Whereas if an unmarried girl saw that a black dog was attacking her in a dream. The dream may indicate that a friend is evil. It haunts her in her waking life. Either if the unmarried girl sees that the black dog has sent some of them in the dream. The vision suggests that she was injured at the hands of one of the people surrounding her or close to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing a dog Black in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees that there is a black dog in a dream, the vision shows several interpretations that lead to the following interpretations:If a married woman sees a black dog looking at her in a dream. The vision may indicate the presence of an evil enemy in her wake. Either if a married woman sees A black dog standing between them, or if he hurts her in a dream. The dream may indicate some family problems or disputes that will soon disappear, God willing. And if a married woman sees a black dog running after her in a dream, the dream indicates that a friend or enemy is chasing her in her waking life and she must Be careful. However, if a married woman sees that there is a black dog eating with her in a dream. The vision may indicate the presence of an evil enemy in the life of the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Some dream interpreters may see the sound of a black dog in a dream. This is a warning that adverse things will happen. By God God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a black dog in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a married man sees a black dog in a dream, the vision may indicate a malicious enemy in his wake. On the other hand, if a married man sees a black dog, then he wakes up in a dream and can do so. The vision may indicate Indicates that you will go through some difficult problems that will be resolved soon, God willing. Either if a married man sees a black dog eating with him in a dream. The vision also shows the confidence of a person who is not in his place, or an enemy entering his house and he does not know him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if a man sees A married man sees a black dog running after him, but he cannot catch up with him in a dream. It may indicate harm caused to him by a nearby enemy, but this harm does not last long, O Almighty God. But if he sees a married man, he hits a black dog in the dream. It may The vision indicates the victory of the enemies surrounding him in his wake, God willing. If a married man sees that he is killing a black dog in a dream, the dream indicates
